services.name: Botox Treatment
services.shortDescription: Reduce fine lines and wrinkles with Botox.
services.longDescription: Neuromodulator injections to soften dynamic wrinkles such as frown lines, forehead lines, and crow's feet. Results typically appear within 3–7 days and last 3–4 months.

services.name: Hydrafacial
services.longDescription: A multi-step facial that uses vortex technology to cleanse, extract, and infuse skin with hydrating serums for an instant glow and smoother texture.

services.name: Dermal Fillers - Lips
services.longDescription: Hyaluronic acid fillers specifically designed for lip enhancement. Adds volume, improves symmetry, and defines the lip border. Results last 6-12 months.

services.name: Dermal Fillers - Cheeks
services.shortDescription: Restore volume and lift to cheeks.
services.longDescription: Hyaluronic acid fillers to restore lost volume, enhance cheekbone definition, and create a more youthful facial contour. Results last 12-18 months.

services.name: Laser Hair Removal - Small Area
services.shortDescription: Permanent hair reduction for small areas.
services.longDescription: Laser hair removal for small areas like upper lip, chin, or underarms. Multiple sessions required for optimal results. Each session reduces hair by 15-25%.

services.name: Laser Hair Removal - Medium Area
services.shortDescription: Permanent hair reduction for medium areas.
services.longDescription: Laser hair removal for medium areas like full arms, bikini area, or chest. Multiple sessions required for optimal results. Each session reduces hair by 15-25%.

services.name: Laser Hair Removal - Large Area
services.shortDescription: Permanent hair reduction for large areas.
services.longDescription: Laser hair removal for large areas like full legs, full back, or Brazilian. Multiple sessions required for optimal results. Each session reduces hair by 15-25%.

services.name: IPL Photofacial
services.shortDescription: Treat sun damage and improve skin tone.
services.longDescription: Intense Pulsed Light treatment to reduce sun damage, age spots, redness, and broken capillaries. Improves overall skin tone and texture. Series of 3-5 treatments recommended.

services.name: Chemical Peel - Light
services.longDescription: Light chemical peel using glycolic or lactic acid to improve skin texture, reduce fine lines, and brighten complexion. Minimal downtime with immediate glow.

services.name: Chemical Peel - Medium
services.longDescription: Medium-depth chemical peel using TCA to address deeper wrinkles, acne scars, and pigmentation. Requires 5-7 days of downtime but delivers dramatic results.

services.name: Microneedling
services.longDescription: Minimally invasive treatment using fine needles to create micro-injuries that stimulate collagen production. Improves skin texture, reduces acne scars, and minimizes pores.

services.name: Microneedling with PRP
services.longDescription: Microneedling combined with your own platelet-rich plasma for enhanced healing and results. The ultimate treatment for skin rejuvenation, acne scars, and anti-aging.

services.name: CoolSculpting - Single Area
services.shortDescription: Non-invasive fat reduction for one area.
services.longDescription: FDA-approved fat freezing technology to permanently eliminate fat cells. Ideal for stubborn areas like love handles, belly fat, or double chin. Results visible in 1-3 months.

services.name: CoolSculpting - Multiple Areas
services.shortDescription: Fat reduction package for multiple areas.
services.longDescription: Comprehensive body contouring package treating multiple areas in one session. Perfect for addressing several problem areas with significant cost savings.

services.name: Morpheus8
services.longDescription: Radiofrequency microneedling that penetrates deep into skin to stimulate collagen and elastin production. Ideal for skin tightening, reducing wrinkles, and improving skin texture.

services.name: PDO Thread Lift
services.longDescription: Minimally invasive procedure using PDO threads to lift and tighten sagging skin. Provides immediate lifting effect with continued improvement as collagen is stimulated.

services.name: Kybella
services.longDescription: FDA-approved injections that permanently destroy fat cells under the chin. Multiple sessions may be needed for optimal results. Minimal downtime with gradual improvement.

services.name: VI Peel
services.shortDescription: Medical-grade chemical peel for all skin types.
services.longDescription: Gentle yet effective medical-grade chemical peel suitable for all skin types. Addresses acne, melasma, sun damage, and signs of aging with minimal discomfort.
